wines.description: This Australian Grenache from historic Seppeltsfield showcases Barossa Valley's excellent terroir for the variety.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of red berries, spice, herbs, and floral notes
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with soft tannins, bright red fruit, and balanced structure
tastingNotes.finish: Clean finish with persistent fruit and spice

wines.description: This Austrian Riesling from the Bockgarten vineyard showcases precise winemaking with minerality and age-worthiness.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of citrus, stone fruit, white flowers, and mineral notes
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with electric acidity, complex fruit, and pronounced minerality
tastingNotes.finish: Long, mineral-driven finish with citrus notes

wines.description: This Washington Cabernet showcases Yakima Valley fruit with structure and concentration.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of blackcurrant, plum, cedar, and vanilla
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with firm tannins, concentrated dark fruit, and balanced oak
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with persistent fruit and structure

wines.description: This aged Bordeaux from Château Haut-Maco showcases development and complexity from the excellent 2018 vintage.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of blackcurrant, cedar, tobacco, earth, and aged complexity
tastingNotes.palate: Medium to full-bodied with evolved tannins, dark fruit, and tertiary notes
tastingNotes.finish: Long, complex finish with aged character

wines.productName: Paso Robles Pomar Junction Cotes de Pomar Blanc 2016
wines.description: This aged California white blend showcases development and complexity from extended bottle age.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of honeyed fruit, nuts, baked apple, and aged complexity
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with evolved acidity, rich fruit, and developed character
tastingNotes.finish: Complex finish with lingering aged fruit notes

wines.productName: Jeff Cohn Domaine des Chirats Syrah 2019
wines.description: This Syrah from Domaine des Chirats showcases northern Rhône character with structure and spice.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of blackberry, black pepper, olive, herbs, and smoke
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with structured tannins, dark fruit, savory notes, and spice
tastingNotes.finish: Long, complex finish with pepper and fruit

wines.description: This prestigious Barolo from Mauro Molino showcases the excellent 2020 vintage with power and elegance.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of cherry, rose, tar, truffle, leather, and spice
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with firm tannins, red fruit, earth, and complex layers
tastingNotes.finish: Very long finish with structured tannins and evolving complexity

wines.description: This Premier Cru Chablis from Domaine Fèvre showcases the Fourchaume vineyard's distinctive minerality.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of citrus, green apple, white flowers, flint, and chalk
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with electric acidity, intense minerality, and precise fruit

wines.productName: Wonderment Wines Hyde Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2018
wines.description: This single-vineyard Sauvignon Blanc from the renowned Hyde Vineyard in Carneros showcases site-specific character with age.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of citrus, stone fruit, herbs, and subtle aged complexity
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with balanced acidity, evolved fruit, and mineral notes
tastingNotes.finish: Clean finish with lingering fruit and mineral character

wines.description: This Gran Reserva Rioja from Viña Albina showcases extended aging with tertiary complexity and elegance.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of dried cherry, leather, tobacco, cedar, earth, and spice
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with silky tannins, evolved fruit, and complex tertiary notes
tastingNotes.finish: Long, elegant finish with aged character
